name: Meditations - October 23, 2019
description:
__________________________________________________________

Sometimes I would fall into a really dark place.
That’s where she found me.
She’s gone now.
But I’m starting to think that’s ok.
As I take a deep breath I know.
I'll find my way again.

__________________________________________________________

A game made by Christian Graham and Connor Lantz for the Meditations game launcher by Rami Ismail.
